scope: STORE + PROOF StorageEvent schema + deterministic replay proof (live vs replay snapshot/hash) + replay-derived metrics
notes: No changes to QFS economics/guards; only StorageEvent emission + test-only replay helper.
storage_event_log now includes NODE_REGISTRATION and EPOCH_ADVANCEMENT in addition to STORE; economics summary reports STORE-event count.
get_storage_proof now emits PROOF_GENERATED/PROOF_FAILED StorageEvents; proof accounting is replay-verified.
storage_economic_views computes replay-derived storage metrics without mutating balances.
